name: Wicked Forest
description:
Hello Gamer,

How are you? Just kidding - I don't care...

I hope you will enjoy my game, it is similar to Plant vs Zombie or Glitch Garden, but a little bit better :).

Thank you for your feedback!

-----Manual for gaming----

Use your mouse to clicking and buying defenders. From the second level use Trophy to hustle dollars for more defenders.

Have a nice day!
